name: dynamic-cloud-dns
description: Dynamic DNS functionality backed by Google Cloud DNS.

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy fdfdc6b6-7112-4636-b37e-f90d61a4b256 --source . --runtime nodejs16 --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point updateHost --gen2 --memory=128Mi --run-service-account=dns-cloud-function@dowhile0-net.iam.gserviceaccount.com --trigger-http --max-instances=1 --set-secrets=/secret/settings.json=ddns-settings:latest
